titleStmt.title: A true narrative and discovery of several very remarkable passages relating to the horrid popish plot as they fell within the knowledge of Mr. Miles Prance ...
titleStmt.author: Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689.

titleStmt.title: A true narrative and discovery of several very remarkable passages relating to the horrid popish plot as they fell within the knowledge of Mr. Miles Prance ...
titleStmt.author: Prance, Miles, fl. 1678-1689.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.

(from t.p.) I. His depositions concerning the plot in general, and a particular design against the life of His Sacred Majesty -- II. The whole proceedings touching the murther of Sir Edmondbury Godfrey, and the particular circumstances thereof -- III. A conspiracy to murther the Right Honourable the Earl of Shaftesbury -- IV. The traiterous intrigues and immoralities of divers popish priests.

person.persName: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of,
